name: Voxel Smasher
description:
Download 'Voxel Smasher' for FREE now and start smashing voxel arts!
Shoot the projectiles to smash the voxel art, use the different projectile types wisely!
FREE daily bonus available now! (Just open the game once a day to collect the bonus!)
Enjoy your Ads-free experience! (The game DOES NOT contain ads! - V0.1)

Simple point-and-shoot system allows for one finger playability!
Easy-to-play!
Fun & Satisfying!

Even more levels coming very very soon!
Follow us on socials to stay updated!
